data.title: Suriya Is All Praises For Srikanth Starring Jyothika And Rajkummar Rao
data.meta_description: In a heart-warming display of support and admiration, actor Suriya took to social media to laud the film "Srikanth," starring his wife Jyothika in a pivotal role. Directed by Tushar Hiranandani, the film has been... - Social News XYZ
data.text:
In a heart-warming display of support and admiration, actor Suriya took to social media to laud the film "Srikanth," starring his wife Jyothika in a pivotal role. Directed by Tushar Hiranandani, the film has been receiving rave reviews for its inspiring story and powerful performances.

Describing the film as a "beautiful rollercoaster ride," Suriya highlighted its ability to evoke a range of emotions, from laughter to tears. He emphasized the film's central theme of showcasing how one person can achieve remarkable feats in life, resonating with the audience on a deeply personal level.

Suriya Sivakumar took to his social media profile and tweeted, “#Srikanth the film is a beautiful rollercoaster ride that’ll make us laugh cry & realise how one person can achieve so many things in life! #Respect @RajkummarRao for his sincere efforts & #TusharHiranandani, Nidi & @Tserie congrats! & #Jyotika the kind of stories you’re part of is always too special Jo! Your presence makes everything around you so real! It’s an important film guys, do watch with your kids. In cinemas from today.”

On the work front, Suriya is busy wrapping Kanguva, a fantasy action film directed by Siva, also starring Bobby Deol, Disha Patani, Natarajan Subramaniam, Jagapathi Babu, Yogi Babu, Redin Kingsley, Kovai Sarala, Anandaraj, Ravi Raghavendra, K. S. Ravikumar and B. S. Avinash.

Suriya is also playing a cameo in Sarfira, a remake of Sudha's Tamil film Soorarai Pottru. The Hindi remake is helmed by Sudha Kongara, the film stars Akshay Kumar, Paresh Rawal, Radhika Madan and Seema Biswas.
